text: Aécio Neves da Cunha (; born 10 March 1960) is a Brazilian economist, politician and former president of the Brazilian Social Democracy Party (PSDB).Quem é Quem , PSDB Website, retrieved 7. October 2014 He was the 17th Governor of Minas Gerais from 1 January 2003 to 31 March 2010. He is a member of the Brazilian Chamber of Deputies. He lost in the runoff presidential election against Dilma Rousseff in 2014. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian economists Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais
title: Aécio Neves
